eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\{Q_{\alpha}, Q_{\beta}\} &=& (\Gamma^m C^{-1})_{\alpha \beta} P_m
+ (\Gamma^{mn} C^{-1})_{\alpha \beta} Z_{mn}  \\\nonumber
&+& (\Gamma^{mnpqr} C^{-1})_{\alpha \beta} Z_{mnpqr}
+ (\Gamma_{11} C^{-1})_{\alpha \beta} Z \\\nonumber
&+& (\Gamma^{m} \Gamma_{11} C^{-1})_{\alpha \beta} Z_{m} +
(\Gamma^{mnpq} \Gamma_{11} C^{-1})_{\alpha \beta} Z_{mnpq}\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
F_{67 \alpha \beta} = \epsilon_{\alpha \beta \gamma} H_1 \nonumber \\
F_{45 \alpha \beta} = \epsilon_{\alpha \beta \gamma} H_2 \nonumber \\
F_{23 \alpha \beta} = \epsilon_{\alpha \beta \gamma} H_3 \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
F_{0 M \bar{N} \alpha} &=& - \frac{i}{2} \partial_{\alpha} g_{M \bar{N}}, \\
F_{0 M \bar{N} \bar{P}} &=& - \frac{3i}{4} [
\partial_{\bar{P}} g_{M \bar{N}} - \partial_{\bar{N}} g_{M \bar{P}} ]
- \frac{i}{2} [ (\partial_{\bar{P}} {\rm ln} H ) g_{M \bar{N}} - 
(\partial_{\bar{N}} {\rm ln} H ) g_{M \bar{P}} ] \nonumber
\label{fstm2c2}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\int_{{\Sigma}_{p}^{'}} \phi_p &=& \int_{\Sigma_p} \phi_p - 
\int_{{\cal M}_{p + 1}} d A_p 
= \int_{\Sigma_p} \phi_p - 
\int_{\partial {\cal M}_{p + 1}} A_p \nonumber \\
&=& \int_{\Sigma_p} \phi_p +  \int_{\Sigma_p} A_p - 
\int_{{\Sigma}_{p}^{'}} A_p
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal E} &=& 
\int d^p\sigma [ \sqrt{- G_{tt}} \sqrt{{\rm det} \; g_{ij}} +
\Phi] \nonumber \\ 
&=& \int d^p\sigma [ \tilde{dV} + A ]
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal P}({\cal A}) &=& 
\epsilon^{i_1 \dots i_p} \partial_{i_1} X^{{I}_1} \dots 
\partial_{i_p} X^{I_p} A_{I_1 \dots I_p} \nonumber \\
&=& 
\epsilon^{i_{l+1} \dots i_p} \partial_{i_{l+1}} X^{{I}_{l+1}} \dots 
\partial_{i_p} X^{I_p} A_{1 2 \dots l I_{l+1} \dots I_p}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\bar{\xi} \{\bar{Q}, Q \} \xi &=&  
\int d^{p}\sigma [ \sqrt{- G_{tt}} \sqrt{{\rm det} h} -  \bar{\xi} {\Gamma_0}  
\gamma \xi] \nonumber \\
&=& \int d^{p}\sigma [ {\cal H} - \Phi - * \phi] \nonumber \\
&=& H - \int d^{p}\sigma [A + \phi]
\

\begin{eqnarray}
2 (n - 3) [\partial_R G_{M \bar{P}} - \partial_M G_{R \bar{P}}]
+G_{M \bar{P}} \; \partial_R ln G  
= \nonumber\\ 
2 G^{N \bar{Q}}[G_{M \bar{P}} \; \partial_N G_{R \bar{Q}} -
G_{R \bar{P}} \; \partial_N G_{M \bar{Q}}] + G_{R \bar{P}} \; \partial_M ln G
\label{dg2=0}
\
